goal.en: learn the basic techniques of physical chemistry experiments and the operations of various instruments
goal.ch: 學習物理化學實驗的基本技巧與各式儀器操作

content.en: “This course is an experimental session of Physical Chemistry courses and aims to help students understand basic physical chemistry experiments. Totally about 13 experiments will be conducted during the whole academic year (two semesters). These experiments will cover thermodynamics, basic physical properties of molecules, molecular spectroscopy, theoretical computation, and basic electronic instrumentation.“
content.ch: 本課程將應用python、Excel等程式語言製圖，此課程在配合物理化學教學內容，以期使學生瞭解基礎的物理化學實驗方法，並簡介現代最新的實驗發展。所包含的實驗有約十三個(一學年)涵蓋熱力學、分子基本物理性質、分子光譜、理論計算與基本電子儀器操作等實驗，以輪作的方式進行實驗內容。

textbook.en: “““Physical Chemistry Experiments““ printed by Department of Chemistry, National Central University“
textbook.ch: 中央大學化學系『物理化學實驗講義』

grading.en: “Experiment Reports 40％ Final Exam 30％ Attendance ＆ Study Attitude 30％“
grading.ch: “實驗報告 40％ 期末考 30％ 實驗精神 30％（含出席狀況、實驗態度等）“

domain.en: 物理化學 、 實驗操作
domain.ch: 物理化學 、 實驗操作

en.competency: To equip oneself with professional knowledge
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance
Test/Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance

紙筆測驗/會考 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現
